name_7: Aluminium Profile for  Window and Door- Custom Aluminium Extrusion
description_7: Lingye Technology aluminium profiles for windows and doors are manufactured with high-grade aluminum alloys with T5/T6 heat treatment. Our profiles are  high precision extrusion, excellent corrosion resistance, smooth surface finishing, and can be customized in size, thickness, and coating based on your drawing or physical samples. They are ideal for residential and commercial window & door systems, ensuring durability, strength, and modern design flexibility.

description_8:
Aluminium tile trim is a durable edging profile designed to protect tile edges and create clean, professional finishes in wall and floor installations.
Made from high-quality aluminum, it prevents chipping, improves overall appearance, and ensures long-lasting protection.
Available in various shapes, sizes, and surface finishes, aluminium tile trims are widely used in bathrooms, kitchens, stair areas, and commercial spaces.

name_9: 2020 T-SLOT aluminium extrusion profile Industrial Aluminium Profile
description_9:
The 2020 T-slot aluminum profile is a lightweight, versatile extrusion with a 20mm × 20mm cross-section.
It features a standard T-slot design that allows easy assembly with various connectors and accessories.
Widely used for DIY frames, 3D printers, CNC machines, enclosures, and automation projects, the 2020 profile offers high strength, corrosion resistance, and flexible modular construction.
name_10: Aluminium Heat Sink | Custom Extruded Aluminum Heatsinks Manufacturer
description_10:
Aluminium heat sinks are designed for efficient thermal dissipation in electronic and industrial systems. Made from high-conductivity aluminum alloy, they ensure stable cooling performance for high-power components such as LEDs, CPUs, and power modules.
High thermal conductivity aluminium alloy

Excellent heat dissipation efficiency

Lightweight, durable, and corrosion-resistant

Available in extruded, CNC machined, and bonded fin types

Supports anodizing, powder coating, and custom finishes

Precise dimensions with strict quality control

Custom shapes and OEM service available

name_11: wholesale aluminium tile trim L shape tile trim
description_11:
Aluminium tile trim is widely used to protect tile edges, create clean transitions, and enhance the overall appearance of walls and floors. Made from durable, corrosion-resistant aluminum, our tile trims are available in multiple shapes, sizes, and surface finishes to match different interior styles.

We offer L-shape, T-shape, round edge, square edge, and stair-nosing profiles, suitable for bathrooms, kitchens, showers, backsplashes, and commercial flooring. All trims are produced using high-quality aluminum alloy with anodized, brushed, mirror, or powder-coated finishes.

As a professional aluminium tile trim manufacturer, we support custom sizes, OEM/ODM services, and bulk orders. Whether you need tile edge protection, corner finishing, or transition joints, we offer reliable products with stable quality and competitive pricing.

description_12:
Our Aluminium T-Slot Extrusion Profiles are manufactured from high-grade 6063-T5/T6 aluminium, delivering excellent strength, precision, and durability. The T-slot design allows you to build frames and structures without welding—simply cut, connect, and tighten.

These profiles are widely used in automation equipment, machine frames, conveyors, 3D printers, robotics, laboratory setups, and industrial workstations.
